import React from 'react'; import {Modal,Button,Container,ModalBody,Col,Row} from 'reactstrap'; import './producto.css'; import {listaCarrito} from './listacarro.json'; class FichaProducto extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(); this.state={ modal:false, listaCarrito, stock:this.props.props.stock }; this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); this.agregarCarrito = this.agregarCarrito.bind(this); } toggle(){ this.setState(prevState=>({ modal: !prevState.modal })); //console.log(this.props); } agregarCarrito(){ listaCarrito.push({ "titulo": this.props.props.titulo, "precio": this.props.props.precio }); this.setState(prevState=>({ modal: !prevState.modal, })); } render(){ return(
Disponibles: {this.props.props.stock} uds.
{this.props.props.descripcion}
 ); } } export default FichaProducto;
